item.title: Setting up evdi after updating kernel to 5.15.12
item.description: intro as you may know, I use an old ipad as a second screen.. in a nutshell, it relies on the evdi kernel module to create a virtual display which is then accessed by the ipad via a VNC Viewer. pne quirk is that almost every time I update the kernel, evdi (and consequently my ipad setup) also breaks. I am not super familiar with kernel shenanigans so I don’t know if it’s a fundamental issue or not.
